properties.name: crawler.news.enabled
properties.description: Whether the crawler should run. Defaults to "true".

properties.name: extractor.article.apikey
properties.description: The API key for extracting articles.

properties.name: extractor.article.apiurl
properties.description: The API url for extracting articles.

properties.name: crawler.twitter.consumersecret
properties.description: The consumer secret key for twitter.

properties.name: crawler.twitter.accestokensecret
properties.description: The secret acces token for twitter.
